com.veil.extendedscripts.extendedapi.constants

Interface IItemType


  • public interface IItemType
    All IItemStack implement getType(). You can compare that result with this class's fields to determine what kind of item it is. This object is available to all scripting handlers through the "ItemType" keyword.
